channel.title: Possible bug: Noble doesn't get info from gossip when occupied, but intensified by CW
channel.description:
#### What happened? I played Noble and used "gossip" on Prince (16). According to output I was occupied, intensified by CW, attacked, but protected by merc (so I was immune). If I was intensified I would bypass occupation and get info (I guess) from my gossip, but I didn't get it.
#### Comments: See screenshot.
![bug|690x388](upload://4A47GRN74tEnjTSIJrQdgZr53t2.jpeg)

item.title: Possible bug: Noble doesn't get info from gossip when occupied, but intensified by CW
item.dc:creator: Intensify
item.description:
Yes…
You should’ve received something.

Probably a bug

Read full topic

item.title: Possible bug: Noble doesn't get info from gossip when occupied, but intensified by CW
item.dc:creator: beo
item.description:
Ok, but the main question still exists": if I was intensified, then I still should have been given info from my gossip.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible bug: Noble doesn't get info from gossip when occupied, but intensified by CW

item.title: Possible bug: Noble doesn't get info from gossip when occupied, but intensified by CW
item.dc:creator: Intensify
item.description:
Umm…

Merc doesn’t give you death immunity…

I assume the Death Immunity came from Icy Veins.

Read full topic
item.source: Possible bug: Noble doesn't get info from gossip when occupied, but intensified by CW

item.title: Possible bug: Noble doesn't get info from gossip when occupied, but intensified by CW
item.dc:creator: beo
item.description:
Moreover, it said I was death immune cause of my passive abilities, King’s guard or CW. Why merc’s shield wasn’t in that message?

Read full topic

item.title: Possible bug: Noble doesn't get info from gossip when occupied, but intensified by CW

item.title: Possible bug: Noble doesn't get info from gossip when occupied, but intensified by CW
item.dc:creator: beo
item.description:
What happened?

I played Noble and used “gossip” on Prince (16). According to output I was occupied, intensified by CW, attacked, but protected by merc (so I was immune). If I was intensified I would bypass occupation and get info (I guess) from my gossip, but I didn’t get it.

Comments:

See screenshot.
